smtools.swing.util

Class JStatusBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • smtools.swing.util.JStatusBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JExtendedStatusBar

    public class JStatusBar
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The JStatusBar class constructs a JPanel that provides an application with a status bar. A user can override the addRighthandSideLabels() method to add his own labels to the status bar's righthand side.
    Version:
    04/03/2013
    Author:
    Sven Maerivoet
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
